name: Kitsune Katana
description:
Fight off the demons that haunt the sacred temple in semi turn based battles!

Use your breathing technique to collect energy from the environment.
Combine matching types of energy to gain access to more powerfull moves!

Made in 10 days by one person for #GBJAM
Didn't quite finish this, but I hope it gets the core idea across!

Controls
↓ - Breathing Technique
↑ - Double Jumping Technique
Z - Energy Technique
X - Skip Turn Technique
